sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Illinois Broadband Adoption Fund Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Illinois Broadband Adoption Fund Act.

sections.heading: Definitions. As used in this Act:
sections.text: Definitions. As used in this Act:

sections.heading: Illinois Broadband Adoption Program
sections.text: The Illinois Broadband Adoption Program is established for the purpose of expanding availability of broadband Internet connectivity throughout the State by:

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
